title: Your Account is in the Process of Transferring
body:
i cant sign in with my main account for some reason, it says "Your Account is in the Process of Transferring. Please try again in a few menutes. If the issues persists contact Player Support."

can someone help pls, its like 2 weeks ago this happened

replies.body: I am currently on my smurf because I can not login with my main, which says that the username can not be found. What the heck is going on?? I have a ton of RP on my main, so I would like to get back on it and make sure it is safe.

> [{quoted}](name=StariiSkies,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=BErnGtbr,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2017-07-10T00:06:12.644+0000)
>
> I am currently on my smurf because I can not login with my main, which says that the username can not be found. What the heck is going on?? I have a ton of RP on my main, so I would like to get back on it and make sure it is safe.

so did they ever help you and figure it out?

Everybody, it is a high possibility your account has been hacked, just found out that today. Someone took my account and transferred to another region. Change all your passwords, maybe even switch emails. To log in, use your current user and password but try different regions until it works. I suggest doing this on the League website so you can change the password easily from there. I used to be in the North America servers, but someone changed it to EUW. So far they've just been using my account for regular play. But anyway be safe, make really hard passwords and write it down somewhere. And be sure to file a ticket so you don't have to spend money to transfer back if your account was moved.

> [{quoted}](name=TheHoboFisherman,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=BErnGtbr,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2017-08-14T18:06:34.055+0000)
>
> Everybody, it is a high possibility your account has been hacked, just found out that today. Someone took my account and transferred to another region. Change all your passwords, maybe even switch emails. To log in, use your current user and password but try different regions until it works. I suggest doing this on the League website so you can change the password easily from there. I used to be in the North America servers, but someone changed it to EUW. So far they've just been using my account for regular play. But anyway be safe, make really hard passwords and write it down somewhere. And be sure to file a ticket so you don't have to spend money to transfer back if your account was moved.

so my friend has tried that but it seemingly did not help should they try and reset the password for each region?

I also have the same problem with my main account(name Moun3erKiLl10) I am not able to log in.Last time when i could use my account was 25.6.2017.almost 1 month since i am not able to use my main account .I sent even tickets but i didn t get an answer not even today andi don t know what to do...

> [{quoted}](name=RockJock,realm=EUNE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=BErnGtbr,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2017-07-19T14:15:15.288+0000)
>
> I also have the same problem with my main account(name Moun3erKiLl10) I am not able to log in.Last time when i could use my account was 25.6.2017.almost 1 month since i am not able to use my main account .I sent even tickets but i didn t get an answer not even today andi don t know what to do...

so they are leaving you in the dark about this? did they ever tell you whats going on?

I wasn't able to see any pending transfers from the account you are posting form, so I'm assuming it's happening on another.  We can look into this for you to see if you got stuck or something, and get you out!  Don't worry, just hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can assist.  We'll reply back asap!
My account is having the same problem but it is not letting me log in to post a ticket because my account doesn't log in.

We can still help if you're having issues logging into the ticketing center.  Instead, hit us up through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) which doesn't require a login.  I hope that helps!

I am having the same problem on my main account as well the username is --  I am getting the same error when i try to log into the client and I can not log into the Forms page with that account because it says it does not exist. I have a trouble ticket open for account recovery but what about not being able to log in?

I've edited out the username for security reasons.  The [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) should not require logging into to submit, but don't worry!  You can also email us directly via support@riotgames.com.  We'll reply back as soon as we can!
Soooo what about the error message i am getting while trying to log in? " Your account is in the process of transfering."
did you ever figure out what happened?
sry i didnt wrote my main account, its -- (the login name)
I've edited out your username for account safety.  Be sure to use the form so we can help!
the form? u mean the Forum? i am actually using it right now i dont know how i should start to do it sry :)

> [{quoted}](name=hN41k,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=BErnGtbr,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-02-09T13:14:36.803+0000)
>
> Got the same problem, guys. Writting from main account here, but i cant login in game with this account. Got the same error. I have no idea whats happening...

Same here. can use everything except the client. I submitted a ticket as well
I am having the same issue but I can't log in to any of the clients, not even to another region I apparently transferred to (and I never did)
so did you ever find out what happened?
ok so did anyone ever figure this out i want to know fairly badly
So I am guessing this is still an unsolved problem? Because mine says the same.. considering making a new account just to take a single game...
got the same problem but on other account got any solutions? i messaged the support but they take so long to respond and always ask the same questions

having the same issue, logged in from my smurf to comment, first it was "Your account has transferred to another region. Please try logging in to the appropriate region." now it's  "Your Account is in the Process of Transferring." Never transferred my account, and this started around the last update, I sent a ticket please help, I can't even log on online.
actually, someone purchased rp on my account w/o me knowing
I am also having this problem please help. Writing from my smurf account since I can't even access my main account.
Got the same problem, guys. Writting from main account here, but i cant login in game with this account. Got the same error. I have no idea whats happening...
